name: UserMailer - Customer Email Notifications
description: High-converting email journeys for your users: welcome, order discount reminder, payment confirmation with upgrade offer, win-back for cancelled/expired users, and unpaid order reminders. Supports en / zh / en_zh / auto language modes, with unified contact/footer and backup site links.

enabled.label: Enable plugin
enabled.description: Enable or disable the UserMailer plugin.

email_language_mode.label: Email language mode
email_language_mode.description: Language for emails sent to users: en (English only), zh (Chinese only), en_zh (both EN+ZH in one email), auto (detect based on user email domain: Chinese providers â†’ zh, others â†’ en).

contact_backup_website_url.label: Backup site URL
contact_backup_website_url.description: Optional backup domain for users to reach you if the main site is blocked or down.

send_welcome_email.label: Send welcome email (on registration)
send_welcome_email.description: Send a clean welcome + fast-start + FAQ email as soon as a user signs up.

send_getting_started.label: Send getting-started guide
send_getting_started.description: Send a simple step-by-step setup email after payment.

send_unpaid_reminder.label: Send unpaid order reminders
send_unpaid_reminder.description: Periodically remind users about unpaid orders, and invite them to ask for payment help.

send_reactivation_email.description: When an order is cancelled or a subscription expires, send a strong win-back offer.
